title: Golden Gate National Recreation Area: References
body: References       There are a variety of documents that guide management of the GGNRA. Many documents, like the National Environmental Policy Act (NEPA) are legal requirements. Others, like the park's General Management Plan and Superintendent's Compendium, are formal documents that create a "contract" between the GGNRA and the public and are specific to the park. Director's and Superintendent Orders direct how how all NPS units will operate.   The below information will help give you an idea of how the park operates and fulfills its mission.    Federal Laws, Regulations and Policies   Regulations specific to GGNRA   Other relevant links   NEPA Definitions and Acronyms
